tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE camera_calibration_parameters (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    focal_length FLOAT,
    sensor_width FLOAT,
    sensor_height FLOAT,
    radial_distortion_coefficient1 FLOAT,
    radial_distortion_coefficient2 FLOAT,
    tangential_distortion_coefficient1 FLOAT,
    tangential_distortion_coefficient2 FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE CameraCalibrationParameters (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    camera_model VARCHAR(255),
    focal_length FLOAT,
    sensor_size FLOAT,
    distortion_coefficients TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE camera_calibrations (
    calibration_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    camera_model VARCHAR(50),
    focal_length FLOAT,
    principal_point_x FLOAT,
    principal_point_y FLOAT,
    distortion_coefficients JSON
);

CREATE TABLE images (
    image_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    image_name VARCHAR(100),
    capture_date TIMESTAMP,
    resolution_width INT,
    resolution_height INT
);

CREATE TABLE calibration_data (
    calib_data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    calibration_id INT,
    image_id INT,
    distortion_parameters JSON,
    FOREIGN KEY (calibration_id) REFERENCES camera_calibrations(calibration_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (image_id) REFERENCES images(image_id)
);

CREATE TABLE CameraCalibrationParameters (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    fx FLOAT,
    fy FLOAT,
    cx FLOAT,
    cy FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE DistortionModel (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_name VARCHAR(50),
    k1 FLOAT,
    k2 FLOAT,
    k3 FLOAT
);
